org.xbmc.eventclient

Class EventClient.PingThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.xbmc.eventclient.EventClient.PingThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    EventClient

    private static class EventClient.PingThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Implements a PingThread which tells XBMC EventServer that the Client is alive (this should be done at least every 60 seconds!
    Author:
    Stefan Agner
